shortDescription: This extention simulate typing text (useful for dialogue scenes or visual novals).
name: AutoTyping
tags: Text, BBText, Dialogue, Visual noval, Autotyping, typing
description:
* Apply auto typing action to a text object to start typing and chose interval between characters.
* It automatically auto type again when the text content changes (but don't forget to trigger once).
* In condition you can catch the event typing end.
* You can also make pause to text typing and resume it after.
